channel.title: Restless Ghost teleport bugs [HELP]
channel.description:
ight, so when you teleport from the Restless Ghost, it does'nt bring you to then right spot; for example:
Tele too: It takes you too: Godwars --> Tormented Demons Tormented Demons --> Coporeal Beast Tz-Har Cave --> KBD Barrows --> Chaos Elemental Coporeal Beast --> Dagganoth Kings
[b]How do i edit it?? [/b]
[b]P.S[/b] This is not real Mr Pker01, this is his little brother. Mr pker01/my brother is in Vacation on other country ..

item.title: Restless Ghost teleport bugs [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“play 4 fun, post:3, topic:397039”]and can you give more details? are you using a command, portal, etc.
if it’s a command, check the command file.
and if it’s an object like a portal, try looking for the code in :actionhandler file and change the coords.[/quote]

He has an NPC(Restless Ghost), that gives tele options, (Godwars and Tormented Demons). But they go to the wrong places.

@ONTopic- Just look for the coords they tele you to, then change them to where they’re supposed to be. Check actionhandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Restless Ghost teleport bugs [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @play_4_fun play 4 fun
item.description:
@play_4_fun wrote:

and can you give more details? are you using a command, portal, etc.
if it’s a command, check the command file.
and if it’s an object like a portal, try looking for the code in :actionhandler file and change the coords.
